author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: If y’all driving through Charlotte on John Belk, be mindful that my big toe is itching. That only means CMPD is on their fuck shit, so slow down.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Do y’all really want me to gas up my car and drive to DC for women’s rights?

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Good morning, Lamarr from Charlotte, NC. From the start of the pandemic onwards to today. I’m ending the break today. https://t.co/M4P0v1FLB4

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: If you work for Amazon in Charlotte, y’all should already know how important Nichols’ chicken is. If I have a Nichols chicken box on the dash of the prime truck, y’all already know y’all getting y’all’s shit.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Hey y’all. https://t.co/HmZtdSvYkd

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: The blatant ineptitude of the people who work in Pineville, the traffic and the 20 mile commute are the reasons why I have to sever ties with this store. The overall culture of running my blood pressure up, wasted gasoline and dinginess are also key factors.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text:
Holy shit, what is wrong with
1. Pineville drivers today?
2. LTE in Pineville?

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: You won’t know because I’ll still remain cordial, but I would distanced myself from you. https://t.co/RJrE2fm1SG

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: And the only way my car is getting fixed before I get your sign fixed, is because I’m trying to get another car.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: “I seriously hope your urchin are not as petty as you; I’ve been able to bounce back without dealing with your stores other than being a goddamn rasthof when I’ve drank too much soda pop… from another store.”

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I just saw the new electric @Kia, and I have to say, it looks SAWEET! I’m gonna have to go to the Kia dealership and see what the stats and damages. Plus, why is my damn passenger seatbelt light flashes when nothing is on that seat?

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: 3pm Chiraq time.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Anyone who knows me knows that 4/20 is an everyday celebration.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: The overall amount of arrests would go down, as most arrests are for non-violent drugs offences. Obviously, better pain management, because if I didn't smoke nearly as much as I do, my ass would be writhing in pain. Things that can be done across North Carolina's 100 counties.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: With Virginia legalizing weed last year, that puts North Carolina in a disposition that they can address easily. The same joie d'vivre of legally doing what we already do can be attained without driving 90 minutes up I-77. Small farmers in  Bumfuck, Egypt would benefit greatly...

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Chile. I'll see y'all at 4... https://t.co/iPiJsnAvB9

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Because it makes no damn sense that we have to go 90 minutes up I-77 to Puff legally. https://t.co/HkqUhNKQeX

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Honeybun, it's 4/20 in inflated America. We have to make the decision on whether or not to put 20 in the gas tank or get a dime bag. Unfortunately, I'm the Golden Goose of my job, so the 20 is going in the gas tank. But I still got enough to last at least till tomorrow. 😌 https://t.co/i8lmT5xzBJ

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: What can be done about this? School resource officers in ALL schools. Metal detectors in all schools. Transparency to all parents, students and faculty to any and all issues pertaining to that school. Expulsion for student on teacher assault. AND BETTER TEACHERS AND ADMIN!

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Sir, in all due respect, you've failed CMS families and faculty. The Title IX violations, clear bookbags and the overall amount of guns found in CMS' junior high and high schools. The inequities at Myers Park and the lack of transparency during the COVID outbreak. To name a few. https://t.co/xAWXMGBO4Q

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Plus, I was not about to park my car at Old Concord Station; the devil is a lie.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I’m torn between leg days. I do not want to have an ass akin to Monroe Road, but I would like things to be proportionate to my current body type. I could’ve had those questions answered if I didn’t have qualms about driving into town, with my speeding ass.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Next chance I get, I need to go to the Nike store and get some more Peggy Sue's.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: The next time we have a bodybuilding competition, do holler at a nigga—especially seeing that I’m trying to get the body that makes folks moist. 😏 Plus, Saturday was a waste of my gas.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I have my reasons. And as I get older, I'm learning not to second-guess myself. https://t.co/HaEyvcfg6W

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I remember everything. https://t.co/OrpXX7POFN

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: … and I will no longer work Saturdays or Sundays.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Because you talk to me as if I’m some adolescent in the self contained classes in junior high and the fact that in the hour I’ve been here, I’ve already ascertained the idea from a pretty good vantage point that it’s a waste of my gasoline, I’m leaving…

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: One thing for sure and two for certain: If I’m gonna be wasting my gasoline today, let me know forthwith and I will mosey on back to the homestead until more humbler venues need me at 17h. Secondly, IF YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT THE FUCK YOU ARE DOING, DO NOT DO IT!

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Goddamn the fact my tag is out by 6 months; goddamn the fact I had Pickle Rick in plain view. Goddamn the fact I had reefer in the car. That’s all he cared about. 70 on a road that should be 60. See you in court.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Charlotte Police is on the fuck shit. But they are being sloppy. Over and above all the shit he could’ve sent me to jail for, his ass mainly was focused on the fact I was going 70 in a 50. On John Belk Freeway.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Exactly the reason why folks have been left on “read”, I’ve avoided people and don’t talk to anyone. If you don’t like me, don’t lead me astray or run me amok. JUST. SAY. IT. https://t.co/FVXHZEg6xa

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Apparently, my manager doesn’t realize that I have expectations as well. I asked him to call me a clear 20 minutes ago about his request for me to come on my day off. Because he hasn’t called early enough, I’m not coming in.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I was looking a sort of decrepit at the QT this morning just to get some bottled water for the gym. When it becomes easier for you to get down than getting back up, welcome to your 30s.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: If I’m with anyone and they wouldn’t dog walk someone on live National TV for me, they weren’t made for me. Because anyone I’ve ever fucked or family (of course) should know that I’m on Will Smith’s side. I will leave you bruised and battered.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Fuck everything at this point. I hate my life and every aspect of it and around it.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Unbeknownst to me, I’m already on OnlyFans.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I know you fucking lying!🤮 https://t.co/bhKbGgAtoh

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Gas is $3.89 at the QT on Graham and 85. Thank god I can see that from the highway.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: And y'all just can't assume that because one has had a suspended driver's license, that they did not have insurance the whole time. For them 2 months, I made sure I paid State Farm.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text:
These baldhead bums in South Carolina gave me a license for going 106 in a 70, never told North Carolina I paid the ticket and my license was still taken. 

NC drivers could lose license for out-of-state speeding tickets | https://t.co/CfbEnWzXKW https://t.co/hMJjZL66UB

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: The stories I have to tell about that. https://t.co/aAyqolgRu5

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Sheeeeeeit! I have not spoken to any of my exes and I'm willing to go out the way to ignore the calls or texts. https://t.co/G0OOfzVIjN

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Is Kia gonna have another Kia Soul commercial with Hamsters?

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I think next week I might go ahead and get my Outer Banks plate.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: Because if you think I am here to play around or keep up appearances, GODDAMN IT I'M NOT!

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: The same things I accepted when I lived closer to Charlotte ARE NOT and WILL NOT be honoured now, being 15 miles away. If you are gonna be lippy, I'm leaving. If you are gonna waste my gas ($3.199/g), I'm leaving. If you don't want me here, let me know before I start my car.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I've been up since 0330, thinking "Why the fuck am I accepting the declining standards of my job and the insurmountable and insufferable recalcitrants I have to deal with?" I've already cussed two managers yesterday.

author: Smokè Da-don🅴
text: I get into a minor wreck at work and post my call out on the employee portal. The manager and one of my mutual aide coworkers have been carrying on ever since. 😂
